p.d: The investigation takes an unexpected turn as two more bodies are discovered. Already three deaths and a killer who seems as elusive as ever... Directed by: Matthieu Vollaire (season 1, France, 2019) Cast: Yaëlle Trules (Clarissa Hoarau), Antoine Stip (Gaspard Watson), Nathan Dellemme (Jackson Bellerose), Marielle Karabeu (Kelly Kwaté), Hindra Armede (Agathe Hoarau), Clémentine Julienne (Joséphine Fleury), Julia Paul (Manon Lambert), Alexandre Varga (Raphaël Mayer) Genre: detective
